name: External Hebel Wall
Details
Angle/sarkingor rab board/top hats in place
Cut treatment - Hebel and top hats - Zinc Rich 1P, 2 - top hat spacing per Façade eng. Designing Site inspection required befoe panels installation
Hebel panels Alignment
Ensure Hebel power panel finish are as per the finishes shown on project drawings and elevations
All sarking /rad board has been installed as per manufacturers recommendations
All fixation details should be hot dip galvanized, 2 - All fixing to be sealed, 3 - Air Vapour barrier (Sarking or RAB) joints should be sealed and taped tightly.
Sarking/RAB overlap flashing by min. 150mm, 2 - flashing-to-flashing overlap by min. 200mm in both sides
Flashings are installed correctly, are continuous and free of any imperfections
Ensure hebel installed plumb and level with adjoining surfaces
Window seal cuts to be neat & consistent
Hebel Panel cut treatment reiforcement - Zinc Rich 1P
Ensure hebel panels are in full and not cracked
Ensure on site routing of panels to be perfectly straight and level
Enure control joints have been installed in accordance with manufacturers specifications and installation guide
Hebel expansion joints have been installed and are consistent including slab junctions
Weep holes have been installed correctly and at correct heights and spacings
All Hebel walls line up with elements above
Insulation installed as per AS/BCA (party walls + external)
Panels finish(patches done)
Fire-rated caulking and sealing (Junctions should treated with Sealant and backing rod - for both top and bottom junction)
Satisfaction and sign off from CSR inspection (Provide report to ALAND)
